mapper.select: select * from tb_user u left join tb_user_image i on u.image_id = i.id where u.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (email, name, password, travel_tag, role, enabled, image_id, create_date) values (#{userDto.email}, #{userDto.name}, #{userDto.password}, #{userDto.travelTag}, #{role}, #{enabled}, #{imageId}, #{userDto.createDate})
